snippet.title: Spotlight Video #8 - Untitled paper RPG
snippet.description:
Adam is a game developer from Toronto, Canada. He graduated from the University of Toronto in 2015 with a degree in Computer Science. He was a programmer and level designer on Pitfall Planet, which was nominated for Best Student Game at the 2016 IGF Awards. 

Untitled paper RPG: Adam is currently working on a paper-cut-out styled adventure RPG. The game is inspired by his favourite RPGs from his childhood, where turn-based combat is enhanced with simple rhythm challenges. 

Spotlight videos highlight each of our teams, one by one, over the course of Stugan 2018. We'll be showing off their games and asking them about their game development tips. Let us know what you think in the comments below! 

Don't forget to follow us! 
Website: http://www.stugan.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/stugan_ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/stugancamp/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/stugan_2018/
